name: The Lost Heir 2: Forging a Kingdom
description: Unite the kingdom to take back your capital city! You'll need dragons, elves, and perhaps even demons to avenge your parents' murder in this fantasy epic.

reviews.review_text: Amazing, a few dissapointments here and there but overall fantastic. Cant wait for the final book of the triology
Achieve 95% of every possible help, still get pummeled. Nope, the system is broken and unbalanced -in a text based game!.
When is the third coming out  nuff said
